Text.val: -- Author: Grzegorz Bujakowski
03.05.2014 GB SCR18844 Added Store FFIS
10.02.2014 GB SCR18696 Changed range of DEBH selection
26.10.2012 SH SCR17619 Skip second GB723 argument
25.06.2011 GB SCR16555 Extended condition for selection
24.06.2010 GB SCR15611 Changed value of update for the Siret number
-- Global variables
-- Variables for ASCII file have to defined with a fixed lenght
-- Prepare ASCII file folder and name
-- Path for ASCII file could not be prepared in UFB533
... valid path for ASCII file exists
-- ASCII file created with contents
-- Create a new row in FILES_FROM_INFORMATION_SUPPLIER (FFIS)
... convert UNIX based text-files to Windows format,only if BPH403
runs nativ on AS400
... emty ASCII file was created, delete file

STP.TXT: E M P T Y A S C I I F I L E ( F R ) H A S B E E N C R E A T E D :
F I L E I S B E I N G D E L E T E D .

ExpSyntax.val: 'Directory for ASCII file could not be prepared by UFB533'

SQL_STMT_U.val:
select A.DEBH_NO, A.DEBH_HADR_NAME1, A.DEBH_HADR_ADDRESS, A.DEBH_HADR_CITY, A.DEBH_HADR_COUNTRY, A.DEBH_TEL, A.DEBH_FAX from :1/debh A where A.DEBH_HADR_COUNTRY in ('FR', 'GF', 'GP', 'MQ', 'NC', 'PF', 'PM', 'RE', 'TF', 'YT') and A.DEBH_DATDELETED is null and A.DEBH_CARRIERDOCTRANS = 'N' and A.DEBH_ENRICHED = 'N' and not(exists ( select * from :1/DHRW C where C.DHRW_FIELDTYPE = 12 and upper(trim(A.DEBH_HADR_NAME1)) like upper(trim(C.DHRW_RESERVEDWORD))||' %' ) )
order by A.DEBH_NO for fetch only optimize for 100 row

Text.val: -- Reset variables
-- Prepare variables for ASCII file
-- Finally update current DEBH row
.. if no data was available for ASCII file, delete empty file in parent task
